menu.title: About
menu.text: I started this project in April 2020, during the COVID-19 lockdown. I wanted to play pool but couldn't, so I turned to simulation. There are some really good pool simulators out there, but none existed that gave me complete control over the physics.
I created pooltool to fill this niche, so that gamers, researchers, and programmers alike could experiment with billiards in a computational playground.

pooltool is an open source project under a GNU General Public License. The source code is available at https://github.com/ekiefl/pooltool. If you are interested in the development of pooltool, I have blogged extensively about the physics, algorithms, and progress I have made over the years. You can check that out at my website: https://ekiefl.github.io/projects/pooltool/
